name: Ibis Paderborn City

reviews.text: Paderborn appears to be a nice little city, I went there on a work trip as there are a number of largish companies based there (Siemens, Wincor Nixdorf).
reviews.title: Wouldn't stay there if they paid me

description: The Ibis Paderborn hotel is located in the town centre of Paderborn, 500 m from the Paderhalle event centre, 1,700 m from the railway station and 15 km from the airport. Book one of our 90 rooms with WiFi Internet and make the most of the amenities we offer, two meeting rooms, a bar, snacks 24 hours, private outdoor pay parking, private undercover parking and public undercover parking, there is a restaurant nearby the hotel. There is also a golf course 8 km and tennis courts 5 km away. Pets allowed.
